name: nothing
description: There's an otherworldly nothing there - it somehow feels like a black wall at the front of your senses, yet you can also tell what lies beyond it.

name: nothing
description: There's an otherworldly nothing there - a black wall at the front of your senses.

name: impossibly thin magenta line
description: You percieve a magenta line here.  It seems impossible thin - you're not even sure it has width in any meaningful sense.  In your mind's eye the space around it shimmers, and you feel you could walk upon it.

name: impossibly thin cyan line
description: You percieve a cyan line here.  It seems impossible thin - you're not even sure it has width in any meaningful sense.  In your mind's eye the space around it shimmers, and you feel you could walk upon it.

name: impossibly thin yellow line
description: You percieve a yellow line here.  It seems impossible thin - you're not even sure it has width in any meaningful sense.  In your mind's eye the space around it shimmers, and you feel you could walk upon it.

name: impossibly flat blue square
description: You percieve a square, here.  It seems impossibly flat - you're not even sure it has depth in any meaningful sense.  In your mind's eye the space around it shimmers, and you feel you could walk upon it.

name: impossibly flat blue square
description: You percieve a square, here.  It seems impossibly flat - you're not even sure it has depth in any meaningful sense.  In your mind's eye the space around it shimmers, and you feel you could walk upon it.

name: shimmering blue square
description: You percieve a square, here.  It is both shimmering and impossibly flat - you're not even sure it has depth in any meaningful sense.  In your mind's eye the space around it shimmers, and you feel you could walk upon it.

name: wavy square
description: You percieve a square, here.  It is both waving and impossibly flat - you're not even sure it has depth in any meaningful sense.  In your mind's eye the space around it shimmers, and you feel you could walk upon it.

name: white cube
description: A true cube of space where one could go left, right, up, down, backward, or forward - it somehow reminds you of home.

name: rotary lever
description: A heavy-duty metal lever with two settings, each marked by an alien symbol.

messages.open: The doors open, and a gust of air hisses by!
messages.close: The doors close while some distant machinery whirrs and thunks!
